amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 53, 59, 60, 62 through 97, and 103 contained in House Report 113-117 and printed on pages H3914-H3919 of the Congressional Record for June 19, 2013.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 53, 59, 60, 62 through 97, and 103 printed in House Report 113-117.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A045) offered by Mr. Lucas.
On agreeing to the Lucas amendments (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
